So Wiz is the fastest
growing software company in history.

We went from 0 to
200 million in 27 months.

The biggest reason why we did that
is because of how we support our customers.

Wiz has been selling
through the channel from day one.

I started about three
months after they began operating.

We were founded in
2020 and when I started,

we had already done
deals through the channel,
which I think is incredible.

The AWS Marketplace helps us scale
through partners and reach more partners

by helping us
understand who are the right

partners for us to
prioritize and focus on.

So for example, when we launched
our partner program earlier this year,

we actually required
that in order to be a part

of our program, they
need to be a part of AWSs.

And so for us, the
way that it's been most

critical is we look
at them as two different
sources of value for our field.
You know, in the first element from the

marketplace
perspective, again, those bigger,
faster, larger deals, but when you bring

that together
combined with a channel partner

to have that
trusted relationship and that

credibility, you
know, I think that it made

my life as a
channel leader so much easier

because when our CEO
came to me and said, Trish,

what leads of

talk about all the
wonderful, amazing things

The customer benefits beyond

From a, when you're
looking at new companies

and choosing who
you're going to align with,

I think something
that AWS does really well

is that before we
can be on the marketplace,

I have to validate
our solution and make sure

that it's secure,
that it's built correctly.

And so from a customer perspective,
it's offloading a little bit of the risk

of adopting new
technologies and honestly making

it a little bit less
scary to be an early adopter.
